title.en: Jishou! Heibon Mazoku no Eiyuu Life: B-kyuu Mazoku na no ni Cheat Dungeon o Tsukutteshimatta Kekka

altTitles.en: The Hero Life of a (Self-Proclaimed) "Mediocre" Demon: The Result of Him Creating a Cheat Dungeon Despite Being a B-Rank Demon

altTitles.ru: Самопровозглашенные герои-чародеи, демоны и читерское подземелье!

altTitles.ja: 自称！平凡魔族の英雄ライフ　～Ｂ級魔族なのにチートダンジョンを作ってしまった結果～

altTitles.zh-hk: 自稱！平凡魔族的英雄生活～明明是B級魔族卻創造了作弊級地下城的結果～

altTitles.ko: 자칭! 평범한 마족의 영웅 라이프 ~B급 마족인데 치트 던전을 만든 결과~

altTitles.ja-ro: Jishō! Heibon Mazoku no Eiyū Life ~ B-kyū Mazokunanoni Cheat Dungeon o Tsukutte Shimatta Kekka ~

altTitles.zh: 自称！ 平凡魔族的英雄生活～明明是B级魔族却创造了作弊级地下城的结果～

altTitles.en: The Hero Life of a (Self-Proclaimed) “Mediocre” Demon!

description.en:
Chrono Alcon, a young demon, traveled from his small village to study at a prestigious school connected to the Demon King's Castle itself. Determined to keep his country-bumpkin status a secret, he tries to keep a low profile… but when his groundbreaking performance in his first test attracts the attention of not only his (gorgeous) classmates, but the Demon King herself… Chrono realizes his dreams of a “happy, normal school life” may die in the dungeons… just like him!  


---

**Links:**  

- [Official Page (JP)](https://kc.kodansha.co.jp/title?page=1&code=1000029608)  
- [Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n4679do/)
- Alternative Official English - [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10290/episode/325625) (U.S. Only), [Kodansha](https://kodansha.us/series/the-hero-life-of-a-self-proclaimed-mediocre-demon/)
description.es-la:
Chrono Alcon, un joven demonio, viajó desde su pequeño pueblo para estudiar en una prestigiosa escuela conectada al mismísimo Castillo del Rey Demonio. Decidido a mantener en secreto su condición de pueblerino, trata de pasar desapercibido... pero cuando su sorprendente actuación en su primer examen atrae la atención no sólo de sus (bellísimos) compañeros de clase, sino de la propia Rey Demonio... Chrono se da cuenta de que sus sueños de una "vida escolar feliz y normal" pueden morir en las mazmorras... ¡como él! 
 
---
